<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bronze Bull Pendant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2966)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This pendant is forged from grainy steel and depicts a snorting bull's face. The pendant must be attached to the chest area or on a shoulder guard. When you activate the pendant, attempt an Athletics check to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) with a +1 item bonus to check. Increase the distance you Shove your target to 10 feet on a success or 20 feet on a critical success.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
